flag.co2

Physical properties of CO2.

flag.co2.bulk_modulus(P: FVec, T: FVec, model: str = 'rpl')

Bulk modulus of pure CO2 [GPa].

Application conditions:

  1. Pressure [MPa] : 0 <= P <= 800

  2. Temperature [C] : 0 <= T <= 826

Parameters:

  • P (TFVec) – Pressure [MPa]

  • T (TFVec) – Temperature [C]

  • model (str) – Model used to calculate bulk modulus. Defaults to ‘rpl’.

Returns:

Bulk modulus of pure CO2 [GPa].

Return type:

TFVec

flag.co2.density(P: FVec, T: FVec, model: str = 'rpl') → FVec

Density of pure CO2 [g/cm^3].

Application conditions:

  1. Pressure [MPa] : 0 <= P <= 800

  2. Temperature [C] : 0 <= T <= 826

Parameters:

  • P (TFVec) – Pressure [MPa]

  • T (TFVec) – Temperature [C]

  • model (str) – Model used to calculate density. Defaults to ‘rpl’.

Returns:

Density of pure CO2 [g/cm^3].

Return type:

TFVec

flag.co2.pressure(rho: FVec, T: FVec, model: str = 'rpl')

Pressure of pure CO2 [MPa].

Application conditions:

  1. Temperature [C] : 0 <= T <= 826

Parameters:

  • rho (TFVec) – Density [g/cm^3]

  • T (TFVec) – Temperature [C]

  • model (str) – Model used to calculate bulk modulus. Defaults to ‘rpl’.

Returns:

Density of pure CO2 [g/cm^3].

Return type:

TFVec

flag.co2.velocity(P: FVec, T: FVec, model: str = 'rpl') → FVec

Velocity of pure CO2 [km/s].

Application conditions:

  1. Pressure [MPa] : 0 <= P <= 800

  2. Temperature [C] : 0 <= T <= 826

Parameters:

  • P (TFVec) – Pressure [MPa]

  • T (TFVec) – Temperature [C]

  • model (str) – Model used to calculate velocity. Defaults to ‘rpl’.

Returns:

Velocity of pure CO2 [km/s].

Return type:

TFVec
